body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Griffin Autosupport. My name is Donald Griffin. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Katherine. Could you please provide me with the make and model of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I drive a blue Honda Civic.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you tell me how many miles are currently on your vehicle's odometer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: There are fifty-four thousand miles on the odometer.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today, Katherine?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad about the product quality of my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Katherine. We will do our best to address your concerns. Thank you for sharing your feedback. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Katherine. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day.
